Synopsis: A helper for running the Power BI Tools extract command in 'watch' mode.
Description: Looks up the Power BI Desktop process ID information before running the required 'pbi-tools.exe' command.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Watch-PbixFile -PbixFilePath myReport.pbix -ExtractPath src/myReport
When run in the root of a git repository, generates the required pr-autoflow artefacts under the '.github' folder.
